alert.note: Alert for Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:47PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JIM WELLS AND SOUTH CENTRAL LIVE OAK COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 647 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, or 14 miles west of Mathis, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Annarose, Westdale, and Rancho De La Parita. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 648 and 660. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
